data.comment: Today's referee, Dean Whitestone, has blown to start the match.
Teemu Pukki scores to make it 0-1 at Ewood Park.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Dean Whitestone has blown to start the second-half.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Harvey Elliott.
In the minute 65, Norwich take a 1-2 lead thanks to Teemu Pukki.
Norwich make their first substitution with Todd Cantwell replacing Josh Martin.
The away team have replaced Mario Vrancic with Kenny McLean. This is the second substitution made today by Daniel Farke.
In the minute 89, Jordan Hugill is replacing Teemu Pukki for the away team.
The match is over. Final score 1-2.
The away team replace Emiliano Buendia with Marco Stiepermann.
